job_description: Join Swipe Pay for a Future of Financial Freedom and Impact! Up to $20,000 Fast Start BonusElevate your career with Swipe Pay's merchant services team. Experience financial growth and personal development in an unparalleled environment.Why Choose Swipe Pay:Hands-On Guidance: Dedicated sales managers mentor you towards success.Build Relationships: Forge lasting bonds with clients, extending beyond transactions.Earn Big: Enjoy upfront commissions, bonuses, and residuals.Qualifications:Experience in B2B/D2D Sales, Merchant Services, Energy Sales, Advertising Sales, Real Estate Sales, or Insurance Sales beneficial.- Outside Sales Experience: Ideal for relationship builders in commission-based sales- Drive for Success: Hungry for more? Swipe Pay supports your journey to financial achievementResponsibilities:As a Sales Partner, present our innovative Programs to merchants, revolutionizing payment acceptance. Cultivate client relationships through cold calls, working with sales managers, and acquiring new clients.- Work with experienced sales managers initially- Conduct sales calls, cold calls, and networking- Utilize our consultative sales approach- Present value proposition and close deals- Upsell clients on POS solutions and moreIdeal Strengths:- Motivation: Break boundaries, surpass targets, and let determination drive you.- Communication: Convey value, build rapport, and excel at closing deals.- Resilience: Embrace setbacks for growth and determination.Experience Financial Freedom with Swipe Pay:Unlock growth, limitless earnings, and team support at Swipe Pay. Shape your career and empower businesses.Don't settle-choose Swipe Pay. Apply now for a prosperous future.Benefits:- Generous residual commissions with upfront bonuses- Customized marketing materials- Customized technology for merchants needs- Free POS placement credit up to $7500 for your qualified clients- Monthly lifetime residual income- Flexible schedule- Account activation bonuses- Customized pricing for merchant needs- Branding program availableJoin Swipe Pay and unlock your potential today!Call us today!
